text: just after the fireworks end people
start to talk in the middle of the
street I was one of them
normally I was walking among the people
and suddenly we heared screaming and we
saw a truck coming just to us and I was
by accident in the middle of the street
just facing the truck me and some people
are around me so that the truck just
stopped in front of me like one meter
one and a half meter maximum and I saw
the truck smashing a girl under and I
noticed that behind the truck there was
a lot of people down on the on the earth
and I saw a guy next to me just few
meters pulling out the girl who was

from down the track and she was almost
not moving at all and I kept waving to

thought he is gonna call the ambulance
because it is an accident and the police
started to scream and to shout and when
when he saw them we come close to the

and even at that moment I thought that
that he is the Rosen he is under attack
I thought that someone is attacking him
from the other side which I cannot see
and I thought he is defending himself
against an attack on him but later I
understood that he was trying to
to shoot the the police to defend
himself and the police started shooting
and at that time they pushed me away
because I was very close all people
